intro.description-2: in cornell format from your notes
intro.text: Just type your notes in the corresponding fields - conotes will generate a PDF in cornell format for you.

previewPDF.title: Cornell Notes - the best notes
previewPDF.notes:
- proven since 1949
- developed by Cornell Professor Walter Pauk
- better than other note taking methods
- for organizing and reviewing notes
- page is divided into sections
- encourages reflection on notes taken
previewPDF.summary: According to the Cornell method, a notepad is divided into three parts. On the right side, the most important things are summarized in short notes. The left column remains free for questions that arise during follow-up or also keywords that are taken from the right part. Subsequently, the content is summarized under the columns in your own words.
